displayName: Ensure IAM users exist (ensure root is not the only user)
rationale: AWS Root account should not be used for resource & workload management. IAM users should be created for use in managing resources and services.
recommended_action: Create IAM users rather than using the root account.
error_message: No IAM users exist in this account
ruleNames: Check for IAM users (ensure root is not the only user)
